title: WERE ONYINYE DI MMA KEELE VA (GODâ€™S GOOD GIFT IS TRULY HERE)
author: Traditional Igbo liturgical chant
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Ezi onyinye ee, vere onyinye di mma Kelee ya

sections.title: Chorus
content: Were onyinye dim ma kelee ya

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Ya kere gi ya n'eche gi - Ezi Chukwu
Yan'edu gi n'uzo nile - Ezi Chukwu
Ya n'enye di ya n'enye nwunye - Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye nwa, ya n'enye ego - Ezi Chukwu

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Yan'enye anwu, ya n'enye mmiri - Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye olu, ya n'enye ike - Ezi Chukwu
Yan'enye uburu na ma akwukwo - Ezi Chukwu
Yan'azo gi n'onya ndi iro - Ezi Chukwu
